name: Orc Raid (itch)
description: Orc Raid is a video game that plays like a hex and chit wargame.  It's created in the spirit of the old microgames from the 1980's.  The Orcs and Trolls must leave their caves and attack the human settlements in order to steal gold.  They get points for every human they kill and points for the amount of gold they return to the caves.  The Orcs have to be careful though, because they lose 5 points for every orc or troll that is killed.  The setup is different each game to give the game more replayability.  All proceeds from this game will be used to help pay for the costs associated with the Centurion's Review website and Youtube channel.  Please note that this game requires a Full High Definition monitor (1080 pixels in height) to display correctly.  Nearly every modern monitor is full high definition, but if you are using an older monitor it probably isn't full high definition.
